org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.errors

Class ApiError

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.errors.ApiError

  • public class ApiError
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines API Error Utility class for manipulating ApiErrorMessage objects

      • toError

        public static ApiErrorResponse toError(java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Returns an ApiErrorResponse object with a single error message generic 0 error code with one error in the list.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage -
        Returns:
        the json of the error. E.g.: {0: [“Generic error 1”]}

      • toError

        public static ApiErrorResponse toError(ApiEMGroup errorsGroup)
        Builds a ApiErrorResponse with all errors stored in this group.
        Parameters:
        errorsGroup -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        #toError(Collection)}

      • toError

        public static ApiErrorResponse toError(java.util.Collection<?> errorMessages)
        Returns an ApiErrorResponse object with list of error messages and updates the response status list of error messages => generic 0 error code with the given list of errors list of custom errors, where integer will be validated to be between 0 and 99
        Parameters:
        errorMessages - a collection of objects of type String or ApiErrorMessage
        Returns:
        the JSON object of the error. E.g.: {0: [“Generic error 1”, “Generic error 2”], 135: [“Forbidden fields have been configured: sector_id”], 123: [“Generic error 1”]}

      • toError

        public static ApiErrorResponse toError(ApiErrorMessage apiErrorMessage)
        Returns an ApiErrorResponse object with a single error message. Generic 0 error code with one error in the list. Updates the response status.
        Parameters:
        apiErrorMessage - ApiErrorMessage object
        Returns:
        the json of the error. E.g.: {"0102": ["Generic error 1"]}

      • formatNoWrap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object>> formatNoWrap(java.util.Collection<?> messages)

      • format

        public static ApiErrorResponse format(java.util.Collection<?> errorMessages)

      • toXmlErrorString

        public static java.lang.String toXmlErrorString(ApiErrorResponse errorResponse)
        Parameters:
        errorResponse -
        Returns:
        convert a error into a well-formed, element-normal XML string
